verses.verse: In the seventh<WH7637> month,<WH6242> in the twenty - first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> the Word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came by<WH3027> Haggai<WH2292> the prophet,<WH5030> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH559> now to Zerubbabel,<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel,<WH7597> governor<WH6346> of Judah,<WH3063> and to Joshua,<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Jehozadak,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest,<WH3548> and to the remnant<WH7611> of the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559>
<WH7604> 'Who is left among you who saw<WH7200> this house<WH1004> in its former<WH7223> glory?<WH3519> How do you see<WH7200> it now?<WH5869> Isn't it in your eyes as nothing?<WH3644>

Yet now be strong,<WH2388> Zerubbabel,<WH2216>' says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068> <WH2388> 'Be strong, Joshua,<WH3091> son<WH1121> of Jehozadak,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest.<WH3548> Be strong,<WH2388> all you people<WH5971> of the land,<WH776>' says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> <WH6213> 'and work, for I am with you,<WH5002>' says Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>
This is the word<WH1697> that I covenanted<WH3772> with you when you came<WH3318> out of Egypt,<WH4714> and my Spirit<WH7307> lived<WH5975> among<WH8432> you.<WH3372> 'Don't be afraid.'

For this is what Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> says:<WH559> <WH259> 'Yet once, it is a little while,<WH4592> and I will shake<WH7493> the heavens,<WH8064> the earth,<WH776> the sea,<WH3220> and the dry land;<WH2724>

and I will shake<WH7493> all nations.<WH1471> The precious things of all nations<WH1471> will come,<WH935> and I will fill<WH4390> this house<WH1004> with glory,<WH3519> says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>
The silver<WH3701> is mine,<WH2091> and the gold is mine,<WH5002>' says Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>

<WH314> 'The latter glory<WH3519> of this house<WH1004> will be greater than<WH1419> the former,<WH7223>' says<WH5002> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies;<WH6635> <WH4725> 'and in this place will I give<WH5414> peace,<WH7965>' says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>"

In the twenty<WH6242> - fourth<WH702> day of the ninth<WH8671> month,<WH8147> in the second year<WH8141> of Darius,<WH1867> the Word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came by<WH3027> Haggai<WH2292> the prophet,<WH5030> saying,<WH559>
"Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies:<WH6635> Ask<WH7592> now the priests<WH3548> concerning the law,<WH8451> saying,<WH559>

<WH376> 'If someone carries<WH5375> holy<WH6944> meat<WH1320> in the fold<WH3671> of his garment,<WH899> and with his fold<WH3671> touches<WH5060> bread,<WH3899> stew,<WH5138> wine,<WH3196> oil,<WH8081> or any food,<WH3978> will it become holy?<WH6942>'" The priests<WH3548> answered,<WH6030> "No."

Then Haggai<WH2292> said,<WH559> "If one who is unclean<WH2931> by reason of a dead body<WH5315> touch<WH5060> any of these,<WH2930> will it be unclean?" The priests<WH3548> answered,<WH6030> "It will be unclean.<WH2930>"

Then Haggai<WH2292> answered,<WH6030> <WH5971>"'So is this people, and so is this nation<WH1471> before<WH6440> me,<WH5002>' says Yahweh;<WH3068> <WH4639> 'and so is every work of their hands.<WH3027> That which they offer<WH7126> there is unclean.<WH2931>
Now,<WH7760> please consider from this day<WH3117> and backward,<WH4605> before<WH2962> a stone<WH68> was laid<WH7760> on a stone<WH68> in the temple<WH1964> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

Through all that time,<WH935> when one came to a heap<WH6194> of twenty<WH6242> measures,<WH6235> there were only ten. When one came<WH935> to the wine vat<WH3342> to draw out<WH2834> fifty,<WH2572> there<WH6333> were only twenty.<WH6242>
I struck<WH5221> you with blight,<WH7711> mildew,<WH3420> and hail<WH1259> in all the work<WH4639> of your hands;<WH3027> yet you didn't<WH5002> turn to me,' says Yahweh.<WH3068>

<WH7760> 'Consider, please,<WH3117> from this day and backward,<WH4605> from the twenty<WH6242> - fourth<WH702> day<WH3117> of the ninth<WH8671> month,<WH3117> since the day that the foundation<WH3245> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s temple<WH1964> was laid,<WH7760> consider it.

Is the seed<WH2233> yet in the barn?<WH4035> Yes,<WH1612> the vine, the fig tree,<WH8384> the pomegranate,<WH7416> and the olive<WH2132> tree<WH6086> haven't<WH5375> brought forth. From this day<WH3117> will I bless you.<WH1288>'"
The Word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came the second<WH8145> time to Haggai<WH2292> in the twenty<WH6242> - fourth<WH702> day of the month,<WH2320> saying,<WH559>
"Speak<WH559> to Zerubbabel,<WH2216> governor<WH6346> of Judah,<WH3063> saying,<WH559> <WH7493> 'I will shake the heavens<WH8064> and the earth.<WH776>

I will overthrow<WH2015> the throne<WH3678> of kingdoms.<WH4467> I will destroy<WH8045> the strength<WH2392> of the kingdoms<WH4467> of the nations.<WH1471> I will overthrow<WH2015> the chariots,<WH4818> and those who ride<WH7392> in them.<WH5483> The horses and their riders<WH7392> will come down,<WH3381> everyone<WH376> by the sword<WH2719> of his brother.<WH251>

In that day,<WH3117> says<WH5002> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> will I take<WH3947> you,<WH2216> Zerubbabel, my servant,<WH5650> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel,<WH7597>' says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> <WH7760> 'and will make you as a signet,<WH2368> for I have chosen<WH977> you,<WH5002>' says Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>"
